[loggers]
keys=root,voodoo,weblab

[handlers]
keys=root_handler

[formatters]
keys=simpleFormatter

[logger_root]
level=NOTSET
handlers=root_handler
propagate=0
parent=
channel=

[logger_voodoo]
level=CRITICAL
handlers=root_handler
qualname=voodoo
propagate=1
parent=root
channel=voodoo

[logger_weblab]
level=CRITICAL
handlers=root_handler
qualname=weblab
propagate=1
parent=root
channel=weblab

[handler_root_handler]
class=handlers.RotatingFileHandler
formatter=simpleFormatter
args=('logs/sample__root_logs.txt','a',52428800,20971)

[formatter_simpleFormatter]
